cv.aboutme: Programming is my passion. I get energy and enthusiasm for learning and creating new things every day.
cv.education-degree-1: Vocational Qualification in Business Information Technology
cv.education-degree-2: Information and Communication Technology, Bachelor's Degree

fulltime.sentence-1: I managed the DevOps side of a few applications to make sure they deploy with correct configurations to Elastic container service (ECS) on Aws.
fulltime.sentence-2: Also, I had a few responsibilities in the productization process and made sure Docker containers' secret management was done in the best way possible.
fulltime.sentence-3: Later I joined the developer’s team to work on migrating multiple react applications’ components to their own npm packages and manage the versions of various npm packages.

internship.sentence-1: I refactored a quite big Express project to Typescript and at the same refactored the Angular project to have a structure for files and modules and updated it to the latest version.

parttime.sentence-1: I manage a React component library and update it as needed.
parttime.sentence-2: Also, I have been working on an accounting project working with an invoicing system.

home.sorry: Sorry for the unfortunate grammer mistakes and the lack of translation
